sentence: The restaurants dowstairs are not cheap but the food is good so you can not really complain
There was a cute restaurant on site that had a great happy hour too
There are a lot of restaurants close by but the hotel restaurant was by far the best
Breakfast is not complementary but the restaurant serves a large variety of food
There were a few bars in the area including the one on the main floor that served up cocktails but unfortunately like most things in DC they close up shop fairly early
The bar restaurant was quite chilly and the room air conditioning was poor
The decor is very traditional both in the lobby restaurant and rooms
I was also provided a voucher for breakfast but I was unable to use it as I was out early
They kindly offered us complimentary breakfast would not recommend if you have to pay for it
Lobby bar and cofeshop have been eliminated
The buffet breakfast was delicious and Starbucks was located inside
Best Breakfast Ever and Customer Service

All staff received us very well especially the concierge he was so generous to send me a fruit cheese plate and a bottle of wine delivered to my dorPros Free internet up to 3 devices Complimentary coffee in lobby until 930 am The lobby smells so good I want to move in there is nothing like a fragrance to leave a lasting impresion Conveniently located to Metro stops and many DC popular atractions Cozy and comfy bed for a good nights slep Great shower pressure
The room is cozy with plenty of room an updated bathroom and cute snack drink amenities
We liked the food and service so much that we returned the following night for dinner
There was only 1 hot item on the menu the other items are just sandwiches and salads right from the fridge from the grab and go market in the lobby a burger with fries
The lunch served was delicious

Friendly staff with professional customer service The concierge Kaouthar was so professional and knowledge about the city and restaurants Tyler was very kind and helpful The hotel is very clean and beautiful Especially the location
Spacious rooms comfortable beds and rooms equipped with mini bars
They had a very nice breakfast non alcoholic beverages throughout the day with coffee tea fruit and bar snacks
